Episodes.Title: Surviving
Episodes.Actors: Jeremy Clarkson, Kaleb Cooper, Katy Coles
Episodes.Plot: Jeremy Clarkson sets out to diversify, as a way of increasing his annual profit (£144 last year).

Episodes.Title: Cowering
Episodes.Actors: Jeremy Clarkson, Kaleb Cooper, Tomasz Bagienski
Episodes.Plot: Jeremy's new herd of cows settle in, but soon reject the fence that keeps them in.

Episodes.Title: Schmoozing
Episodes.Actors: Jeremy Clarkson, Kaleb Cooper, Gerald Cooper
Episodes.Plot: Faced with Council powers that be, Jeremy uses two of his greatest skills: diplomacy and respect for red tape.

Episodes.Title: Badgering
Episodes.Actors: Jeremy Clarkson, Kaleb Cooper, Thomas Haynes
Episodes.Plot: Jeremy Clarkson comes face to face with his nemesis: the badger.

Episodes.Title: Council-ing
Episodes.Actors: Jeremy Clarkson, Kaleb Cooper, Paddy Bourns
Episodes.Plot: The day of the Council's decision on Jeremy's restaurant arrives.

Episodes.Title: Counselling
Episodes.Actors: Jeremy Clarkson, Kaleb Cooper, Gerald Cooper
Episodes.Plot: The fall-out from the Council's decision continues to fall out.

Episodes.Title: Scheming
Episodes.Actors: Jeremy Clarkson, Kaleb Cooper, Gerald Cooper
Episodes.Plot: Jeremy's restaurant idea is re-born, and there's not a moment to waste.

Episodes.Title: Climaxing
Episodes.Actors: Jeremy Clarkson, Kaleb Cooper, Gerald Cooper
Episodes.Plot: Secret preparations accelerate for the opening of Jeremy's restaurant.
